head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths SIMON, PONY BOUCHE,

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths SIMON, PONY BOUCHE,

block.p: SIMON-Pony Bouche, 93, a Millbrook resident, died Saturday, October 14, 2000 at Sharon Hospital, Sharon, Connecticut. In lieu of flowers, donations may be made to The Pony Simon Scholarship Fund at the Kildonan School, 425 Morse Hill Road, Amenia, New York 12501. A Memorial Service will be held at St. Peter's Church in Lithgow, New York at 4:00 P.M., on Sunday, October 22nd. Allen Funeral Home, Franklin Avenue, Millbrook, N.Y.
